title: The Diamond Rose: a life of love and duty.
author: Tytler, Sarah
snippet: it was death—andhere was the official paper commanding to hangand quarter the rogue Sir John Cochrane of Ochiltree.

title: The Diamond Rose: a life of love and duty.
author: Tytler, Sarah
snippet: I got out my Galloway pony that had been sic a pet at Ochiltree,and I rode off ere break of day one summer morning, as a young serving-woman, journeying to seeher mother upon the Borders.

title: The Diamond Rose: a life of love and duty.
author: Tytler, Sarah
snippet: The guests at Ormeslaw were two honest men—the one old and the other young—George Loganof Leith, and John Kerr of Morriston, and theirgentle dames were Isabel Fowler of Burncastle, andGrizel Cochrane of Ochiltree.
